review: Setup is easy once my TV set recognized the HDMI signal.  Playback is smooth and sharp compared to Verizon FIOS.  The channel choice is great including Showtime Anywhere compared to ROKU. Prime does not include enough new releases and you turn in your MP3 music selections if you cancel your account.  Music downloads to your own device are not allowed (for CD burning?).  Music playback is only on the Amazon Music App.  With this list of negatives why did I give it 4 stars,?  Ease of use, image quality, selection of programs, movie rental pricing is slightly lower than FIOS with free Prime movies (older selections), digital audio output (Roku does not offer this on latest boxes) and no password is needed to play movies as with ROKU.
